website_summaries.verdict: At launch, the new Intel SSD 730 Series makes a very good internal drive choice for your computer, but it'll become a better value when its street price drops below the current suggested retail price.
pros: The Intel SSD 730 Series has a high endurance rating and comes with a five-year warranty
The drive offers a huge boost in performance compared with regular hard drives and can handle RAID configurations
cons: The new drive doesn't support encryption, and its performance isn't the best among similarly priced SSDs

customer_reviews.title: I can boot windows super fast, all the apps open in less than ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last november and the second one just one week ago. I bought a new notebook with raid0 capability. I used both disk as one hard drive. I can boot windows super fast, all the apps open in less than five seconds. I believe the future of the hard drives will be ssd with multiple raid arrarys. I recommend this product for controls engineers that works at the field and use heavy software like Siemens step 7, Wincc Flexible, RSLogix and Factory Talk. This product improves my productivity. Regards
customer_reviews.author: V. Martinez Castro

customer_reviews.title: Having been prepared made all this easy I only use the drive for the OS and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one the first was a fluke failing in the first two weeks. I was not discouraged and the return policy was outstanding as I imaged the drive and when I got this one I was back in business in less the 11 minutes. I had read the need for back ups and I knew it the drive failed that was it. Having been prepared made all this easy I only use the drive for the OS and programs all my date is triple backed up on regular hard drives. Two which are not hooked up just in case of ransom-ware which happened to me once already I was perpared.
customer_reviews.author: George B Kearnes

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but so far worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but so far worth it. Purchased this for a client to replace a SATA drive and then reinstall the OS and other applications and files. It's as fast as advertised and there was no problem at all with the installation of the OS. You can really notice the difference in speed on the boot up. I'm very happy with the purchase and so is my client.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: A dramatic upgrade for my Dell Inspiron laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this SSD in a Dell Inspiron 11 3148 laptop and the results are fantastic! Now my laptop boots quickly and applications start much faster then they did with the hard drive! Although I read reviews that state the laptop's battery life will suffer due to the high current demands of this SSD, the battery life is about the same that it was with the hard drive! In summary, I don't see how you can go wrong with this SSD!
customer_reviews.author: FortLuptonDiver

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect SSD for your games
customer_reviews.text: I thought the SSD my OS runs on is fast---This SMOKES it! This is the perfect SSD for your games. Just make sure you get a HDD for your media. Don't want to waste read/write since SSD is limited. You will hear people exclaim about how new SSD's don't suffer as bad but remember it still degrades: Why add to it?
customer_reviews.author: MadROMAD

customer_reviews.title: Very fast, and slick looking with the Skull. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, and slick looking with the Skull. I wish the skull would have been flipped upside down. The case that I am using only can accommodate the drive a certain way and when looking inside the skull is upside down. Or I wish the sticker could bee added myself. But other than that it is everything I expected and should expect fro an SSD.
customer_reviews.author: John Massaro

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: The data transfer tool worked very well. I wish there were more instructions by the manufacturere on how to do the process. Had to google it and refer to some forums to get the right directions. Nonetheless, the drive transformed my 6 years old PC into a blazing fast machine. This is the single most noticeable upgrade I have ever done. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Varun Vaidya

customer_reviews.title: Still going. Once you go SSD, you never ...
customer_reviews.text: Still going. Once you go SSD, you never go back. I have one that's been through 3 operating systems, and two computers. They outlast everything and find data 100X faster than a conventional drive.
customer_reviews.author: marvintm

customer_reviews.title: From now on any computer I own will have an SSD
customer_reviews.text: I don't even have a SATA 3 interface in my computer, and it's made a big difference. I did have to download an AHCI driver to get it to max speed, but that max speed was shown in a test, I'm not sure I would have noticed the difference in real life.
customer_reviews.author: J Gillman

customer_reviews.title: Very fast drive.
customer_reviews.text: After installing Windows on this drive, the startup time is approximately three times faster. All five of my computers now have this drive installed.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne G Owen

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Easy install; included software that copied my old jd drive across without a glitch!
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money. Repeat to yourself the following: "I get what i pay for. When i buy cheap SSD brands, i am putting my data at risk. It is worth a small premium to get guaranteed quality". This ends my public service announcement.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Wish my system could handle the NEW ssd but, this one works great and fast.

customer_reviews.title: The HD migration tool worked better than I expected and I love the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: The HD migration tool worked better than I expected and I love the fact that this hard drive is fast! Since I'm using it as my "C" drive, everything is faster and I have PLENTY of room for new programs. :) Definitely a worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This drive is awesome. I have a 2011 MacBook that got slower ...
customer_reviews.text: This drive is awesome. I have a 2011 MacBook that got slower with each new OSX update. This drive brought new life to my 5 year old laptop
customer_reviews.author: R2D2TX

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this SSD is pretty good and it runs very fast
customer_reviews.text: After installing this Intel 730 480GB SSD to replace the smaller Crucial MX500 240GB SSD on my Dell Precision M4800, my Crucial mSATA SDD in the same laptop became unbootable. This is a weird behavior caused by this Intel 730 SSD. I'm not sure if it is a common issue. I haven't seen this problem with some other SSDs. The quality of this SSD is pretty good and it runs very fast, but it is sad that I have to return it because it doesn't fit my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jin

customer_reviews.title: and Good. Bought the Intel over the similar Samsung for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast, Stable, and Good. Bought the Intel over the similar Samsung for the 5 year warranty since specs are similar enough. Works as advertised. Was able to easily clone my laptops old disk to the SSD in less than an hour.

customer_reviews.title: Drive is fast but draws quite a bit of power ...
customer_reviews.text: Drive is fast but draws quite a bit of power during idle. Drive no longer is operational after only almost a month. Returned and ordered a Samsung 850 pro.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Still working strong since I purchased it months ago. Very reliable, high quality construction. Will buy SSDs from Intel again for sure.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Fast and Reliable so far.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, fast and reliable. In retrospect, I think there may be more cost effective choices but I don't regret the decision.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the my third Intel SSD. I own a 320 160gb, A 520 240gb and now this a 730 480gb. All of the drives are still fully operational. I have always trusted Intel SSD's to be reliable. I have owned other brands of SSD drives and have never found them to be reliable. The Intel SSD drives may not be as fast as other brands but they are reliable ( that's the name of the game for me ) . You can't go wrong with Intel.

This drive runs silently and boots quickly. No problems at all as far as heat and i'm running 3 separate virtual machines.

customer_reviews.title: Another quality product from Intel!

customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement from HDD, no issues slapping it in my laptop and getting going. Haven't had any heat issues and it's still lightning fast.

customer_reviews.title: Intel 730 Series 2.5" SSD 480GB
customer_reviews.text: This SSD is my second and replaces a 2 1/2 year old SSD that failed (competitors brand with a 3 year warranty) in my main PC. Installation and preparation for this drive is straight forward and a 5 year warranty certainly gives me significant peace of mind. Fortunately, I have StorageCraft ShadowProtect Desktop installed and managed a full bare metal restoration of my system in 9 minutes! This SSD is extremely quick as one might expect and I have a new sense of confidence for this drive's longevity. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.text: The hard drive was an easy installation in my desk top computer. The cloning software that came with it worked flawlessly. My old hard drive is being use as a second hard drive. Would recommend this product

customer_reviews.title: Management software for this SSD doesn't work with PCIe SATA adapters
customer_reviews.text: Works well as long as you have a spare SATA port on the motherboard that you can connect the SSD to. The Intel SSD Toolbox is not supported on PCIe SATA SSD adapters such as Acronis Velocity Duo X2. Google "intel communities intel 730 ssd Acronis Velocity Duo X2" to find confirmation from Intel that Intel SSD Toolbox doesn't work with PCIe SATA adapters. Without Intel SSD Toolbox, you can't manage/optimize this SSD.

customer_reviews.text: This SSD is not nearly as fast as comparable Samsung drives that I've been using for a few years. I'm not impressed and will probably stick to Samsung for my future builds.

customer_reviews.title: Fast but failed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this SSD for the purpose of reliability and high endurance since this is basically a modified commercial grade drive. It performed well but failed after a week. It wasn't even written entirely so it had hardly any wear. There was a solar flare the night before I turned it on and failed so that could have caused the failure. I tried to use SATA adapters and attempted to reformat the drive but was not able to get the drive to work again. Amazon did refund the drive, though.
